headline: We Were Acquired by Cloudflare, Here’s What’s Next
keywords: Cloudflare Apps, Save The Web, Acquisitions, Developers, Programming
description: Like most of you, I first heard of Cloudflare via this blog. I read about HTTP/2, Railgun, the Hundredth Data Center, and Keyless SSL — but I never thought I would work here. I, along with my co-founder Adam, and our friends and coworkers were hard at work building something very different.
